      • writeNamedListAsMapMangled

        protected void writeNamedListAsMapMangled(String name,
                              NamedList val)
                                   throws IOException
        Represents a NamedList directly as a JSON Object (essentially a Map) Map null to "" and name mangle any repeated keys to avoid repeats in the output.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeNamedListAsMapWithDups

        protected void writeNamedListAsMapWithDups(String name,
                               NamedList val)
                                    throws IOException
        Represents a NamedList directly as a JSON Object (essentially a Map) repeating any keys if they are repeated in the NamedList. null is mapped to "".
        Throws:
        IOException
